author: Nope-ity Nope
text: I just had a conversation with someone about an issue I had with him. He didn't avoid the conversation or try to lie to me. He acknowledged my POV, I acknowledged his POV, and we BOTH apologized to one another. Imagine more of that in this world. #adulting #communication
